description: In #1160309 one inconsistency between Nova-Net and Neutron was fixed, but there are two more places left, when Neutron may raise 404 error for show_floatingip, but this is not handled by Nova - get_floating_ips_by_project() and _get_floating_ip_by_address().
title: Nova API floating IP error code inconsistent between Nova-Net and Neutron

comments.content: In #1160309 one inconsistency between Nova-Net and Neutron was fixed, but there are two more places left, when Neutron may raise 404 error for show_floatingip, but this is not handled by Nova - get_floating_ips_by_project() and _get_floating_ip_by_address().
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~raorn

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/226274
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/226274
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=e5c9b7ecc62e1b9400d20540c7d5c10982506d3a
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit e5c9b7ecc62e1b9400d20540c7d5c10982506d3a
Author: Alexey I. Froloff <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Sep 22 14:39:40 2015 +0300

    Fix more inconsistency between Nova-Net and Neutron
    
    The commit c62f698ef1f1e69bd5eb3c6544ee305f96488d42 fixed one
    incosistency between Nova-Net and Neutron, when Neutron returns 404
    error for list_floatingip and Nova translates it into 500 computeFault.
    However, there are two other places where list_floatingips is called.
    
    Move common code into private helper function, where 404 Error from
    Neutron is gracefully handled, and use it where appropriate.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1498443
    Related-Bug: #1163670
    
    Change-Id: I9229d882712df1ad57afbda7477fa4d72f4fd83c
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
